Class ConnectFourGame

extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      This provides the instructions for the Connect Four game, and gets the names of the players.
      static void playAgain(Player playerOne, Player playerTwo)
      This method asks if the players wish to restart the game.
      static void playerTurn(Player player, Board game)
      This method does the turn for each player.
      static void playerWin(Player player, Board game)
      This method shows the winner of the game.
      static void playGame(Player playerOne, Player playerTwo)
      This method creates the board and starts the game.

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        This provides the instructions for the Connect Four game, and gets the names of the players.
        Parameters:

      • playGame

        public static void playGame(Player playerOne,
                            Player playerTwo)
        This method creates the board and starts the game.
        Parameters:
        playerOne - player object for first player
        playerTwo - player object for second player

      • playerTurn

        public static void playerTurn(Player player,
                              Board game)
        This method does the turn for each player.
        Parameters:
        player - player object for player
        game - game board to record player moves

        This method shows the winner of the game.
